h2_title: The Duskveil Boss Fight and Guide
content: Once you know where and when his sword will appear, the rest of the fight will come down to waiting for openings after his big attack to hit him hard, using your Spirit Attacks and Transformation Spells in this phase to speed things up. With all of his attacks being fairly visible to spot coming, it shouldn't take too long to get the hang of and send this demon rooster to the abyss.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'The_Duskveil.md', within the main section titled 'The Duskveil', specifically from the subsection 'The Duskveil Boss Fight and Guide'.
The content is as follows:
Once you know where and when his sword will appear, the rest of the fight will come down to waiting for openings after his big attack to hit him hard, using your Spirit Attacks and Transformation Spells in this phase to speed things up. With all of his attacks being fairly visible to spot coming, it shouldn't take too long to get the hang of and send this demon rooster to the abyss.
